[00:00.27]Shivers - Ed Sheeran
[00:00.61]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Johnny McDaid/Kal Lavelle/Steve Mac
[00:02.40]
[00:12.48]I took an arrow to the heart
[00:14.27]
[00:15.82]I never kissed a mouth that tastes like yours
[00:18.47]
[00:18.97]Strawberries and then somethin' more
[00:21.90]
[00:22.58]Ooh yeah I want it all
[00:23.79]
[00:26.10]Lipstick on my guitar
[00:27.31]
[00:27.86]Ooh
[00:28.07]
[00:29.10]Fill up the engine we can drive real far
[00:31.57]
[00:32.79]Go dancin' underneath the stars
[00:35.48]
[00:36.01]Ooh yeah I want it all
[00:37.90]
[00:39.34]Mmm you got me feelin' like
[00:40.77]
[00:41.39]I wanna be that guy I wanna kiss your eyes
[00:44.03]
[00:44.86]I wanna drink that smile I wanna feel like I'm
[00:47.55]
[00:48.21]Like my soul's on fire I wanna stay up all day and all night
[00:52.47]Yeah you got me singin' like
[00:54.77]Ooh I love it when you do it like that
[00:57.42]And when you're close up give me thе shivers
[00:59.92]
[01:00.73]Oh baby you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
[01:04.14]And whеn they say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
[01:07.77]And we'll say "Ooh I love it when you do it like that"
[01:11.08]And when you're close up give me the shivers
[01:13.50]
[01:14.30]Oh baby you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
[01:17.68]And when they say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
[01:21.16]Into the car
[01:21.68]
[01:23.86]On the back seat in the moonlit dark
[01:25.98]
[01:27.11]Wrap me up between your legs and arms
[01:29.88]
[01:30.58]Ooh I can't get enough
[01:32.32]
[01:34.07]You know you could tear me apart
[01:35.58]
[01:36.29]Ooh
[01:37.23]Put me back together and take my heart
[01:39.80]
[01:40.74]I never thought that I could love this hard
[01:43.49]
[01:44.01]Ooh I can't get enough
[01:45.90]
[01:47.40]Mmm you got me feelin' like
[01:48.80]
[01:49.47]I wanna be that guy I wanna kiss your eyes
[01:52.00]
[01:52.81]I wanna drink that smile I wanna feel like I'm
[01:55.33]
[01:56.17]Like my soul's on fire I wanna stay up all day and all night
[02:00.47]Yeah you got me singin' like
[02:02.06]
[02:02.73]Ooh I love it when you do it like that
[02:05.41]And when you're close up give me the shivers
[02:07.82]
[02:08.72]Oh baby you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
[02:12.04]And when they say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
[02:15.75]And we'll say "Ooh I love it when you do it like that"
[02:18.96]And when you're close up give me the shivers
[02:21.49]
[02:22.29]Oh baby you wanna dance 'til the sunlight cracks
[02:25.55]And when they say the party's over then we'll bring it right back
[02:29.35]Baby you burn so hot you make me shiver
[02:32.85]With the fire you got this thing we started
[02:36.36]I don't want it to stop
[02:38.54]You know you make me shiver -er -er
[02:43.16]Baby you burn so hot you make me shiver
[02:46.51]With the fire you got this thing we started

[03:09.66]Oh no

[03:16.06]

[03:23.92]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Shivers]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:Shivers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.27]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.61]//
[00:02.40]
[00:12.48]爱情的箭矢正中我的心脏
[00:14.27]
[00:15.82]我从未品尝过如你嘴唇般的味道
[00:18.47]
[00:18.97]像是草莓 却又更加香甜
[00:21.90]
[00:22.58]我想要占有你的所有
[00:23.79]
[00:26.10]将口红印上我的吉他
[00:27.31]
[00:27.86]//
[00:28.07]
[00:29.10]极速狂飙 我们可以远走高飞
[00:31.57]
[00:32.79]在星空下翩翩起舞
[00:35.48]
[00:36.01]我想要占有你的所有
[00:37.90]
[00:39.34]你让我感觉
[00:40.77]
[00:41.39]我想要成为你的伴侣 我想要亲吻你的眼睛
[00:44.03]
[00:44.86]我想要酌饮你的笑容 我想要感受
[00:47.55]
[00:48.21]灵魂熊熊燃烧 我想要日夜不眠地沉沦爱河
[00:52.47]你让我纵情歌唱
[00:54.77]我喜欢你对我这样
[00:57.42]当你向我靠近 让我激动地战栗
[00:59.92]
[01:00.73]宝贝 你想要一直舞蹈 直到破晓
[01:04.14]当他们宣布派对结束 我们会让狂欢继续
[01:07.77]我们会放声高呼 "我喜欢你对我这样"
[01:11.08]当你向我靠近 让我激动地战栗
[01:13.50]
[01:14.30]宝贝 你想要一直舞蹈 直到破晓
[01:17.68]当他们宣布派对结束 我们会让狂欢继续
[01:21.16]坐进车里
[01:21.68]
[01:23.86]在月光照耀的黑夜 在车的后座
[01:25.98]
[01:27.11]用你的双腿 用你的双臂紧紧环抱住我
[01:29.88]
[01:30.58]我无法满足
[01:32.32]
[01:34.07]你知道你可以让我四分五裂
[01:35.58]
[01:36.29]//
[01:37.23]又将我拼凑完好 将我的心拿走
[01:39.80]
[01:40.74]我从未想过我会如此深陷爱河
[01:43.49]
[01:44.01]我无法满足
[01:45.90]
[01:47.40]你让我感觉
[01:48.80]
[01:49.47]我想要成为你的伴侣 我想要亲吻你的眼睛
[01:52.00]
[01:52.81]我想要酌饮你的笑容 我想要感受
[01:55.33]
[01:56.17]灵魂熊熊燃烧 我想要日夜不眠地沉沦爱河
[02:00.47]你让我纵情歌唱
[02:02.06]
[02:02.73]我喜欢你对我这样
[02:05.41]当你向我靠近 让我激动地战栗
[02:07.82]
[02:08.72]宝贝 你想要一直舞蹈 直到破晓
[02:12.04]当他们宣布派对结束 我们会让狂欢继续
[02:15.75]我们会放声高呼 "我喜欢你对我这样"
[02:18.96]当你向我靠近 让我激动地战栗
[02:21.49]
[02:22.29]宝贝 你想要一直舞蹈 直到破晓
[02:25.55]当他们宣布派对结束 我们会让狂欢继续
[02:29.35]宝贝 你热情似火 你的火焰让我忍不住颤抖
[02:32.85]我们开始的这一切 
[02:36.36]我不想结束 
[02:38.54]你知道你让我忍不住颤抖
[02:43.16]宝贝 你热情似火 你的火焰让我忍不住颤抖
[02:46.51]我们开始的这一切
[02:49.98]我不想结束 
[02:52.27]你知道你让我忍不住颤抖
[02:54.16]

[02:57.22]我喜欢你对我这样
[03:00.03]当你向我靠近 让我激动地战栗
[03:02.47]
[03:03.30]宝贝 你想要一直舞蹈 直到破晓
[03:06.62]当他们宣布派对结束 我们会让狂欢继续
[03:09.66]//
